name: Kieler Meeresfarm
goal:
Situated in Kiel, Germany. Producing and selling organically, regional grown seafood from the Baltic Sea.
Further the use of sustainable aquaculture, develop aquaculture techniques in a sustainable, bio-friendly way.
interests: Climate Action, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Information Society
euInitiatives: European Union Strategy for the Baltic Sea Region
